Text.Page:
A power source...that's the next step.

And what power source could be better than fireâ€”especially when you're standing on the very ground where Bahaar, the god of fire, lurks.

Flamelicked ore, infused with the essence of Bahaar himself. That's what we need.
The pure power of fire...now for us to command.
All the mirrors in the world won't help us without flamelicked ore to serve as our power source.
